org.apache.flink.runtime.managementgraph

Class ManagementGate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.managementgraph.ManagementAttachment
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.managementgraph.ManagementGate

  • public final class ManagementGate
extends ManagementAttachment
    This class implements an input or output gate of a ManagementVertex. The gate is derived an input or output gate of the actual execution vertex.

    This class is not thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManagementGate(ManagementVertex managementVertex, ManagementGateID gateID, int index, boolean isInputGate)
      Constructs a new management gate.

        public ManagementGate(ManagementVertex managementVertex,
              ManagementGateID gateID,
              int index,
              boolean isInputGate)
        Constructs a new management gate.
        Parameters:
        managementVertex - the management vertex this gate belongs to
        index - the index of this gate
        gateID - The id of the new management gate
        isInputGate - true if this gate represents an input gate in the actual execution graph, false otherwise
